description.english: Completed the Tutorial
description.german: Das Tutorial abgeschlossen.
description.french: A complété le didacticiel.
description.italian: Hai completato il tutorial.
description.spanish: Has completado el tutorial.
description.schinese: 已完成教程。
description.danish: Gennemførte tutorial.

description.english: Found the papers in the chicken coop
description.german: Die Papiere im Hühnerstall gefunden.
description.french: Documents trouvés dans le poulailler.
description.italian: Hai trovato i documenti nel pollaio.
description.spanish: Has encontrado los documentos en el gallinero.
description.schinese: 已在鸡笼里找到文件。
description.danish: Fandt papirerne i hønseskuret.

description.english: Discovered Esther and Sophia
description.german: Esther und Sophia entdeckt.
description.french: Esther et Sophia découvertes.
description.italian: Hai scoperto Esther e Sophia.
description.spanish: Has encontrado a Esther y a Sophia.
description.schinese: 已发现埃丝特和索菲亚。
description.danish: Opdagede Esther og Sophia.

description.english: Discovered the Smuggler's Den behind the inn
description.german: Das Schmugglerversteck hinter dem Gasthof entdeckt.
description.french: Repaire de contrebande découvert derrière l'auberge.
description.italian: Hai scoperto il covo dei contrabbandieri dietro la locanda.
description.spanish: Has descubierto la guarida del contrabandista tras la posada.
description.schinese: 已发现旅馆后面的走私者巢穴。
description.russian: Вы нашли убежище контрабандистов за трактиром.
description.danish: Opdagede smuglerreden bag ved kroen.

description.english: Broke into the clinic
description.german: In die Praxis eingebrochen.
description.french: Entrée par effraction dans la clinique effectuée.
description.italian: Hai fatto irruzione nella clinica.
description.spanish: Te has colado en la clínica.
description.schinese: 已闯入诊所。
description.danish: Brød ind i klinikken.

description.english: Gathered information in the Sunday mass
description.german: Informationen bei der Sonntagsmesse gesammelt.
description.french: Informations recueillies à l'office du dimanche.
description.italian: Hai raccolto informazioni alla messa della domenica.
description.spanish: Has conseguido información en la misa del domingo.
description.schinese: 已在周日的弥撒上搜集信息。
description.russian: Вы собрали информацию во время воскресной мессы.
description.danish: Samlede informationer til søndagsgudstjenesten.

description.english: Gossiped with several banquet attendees
description.german: Mit verschiedenen Teilnehmern des Banketts geplaudert.
description.french: Potins échangés avec des convives du banquet.
description.italian: Hai spettegolato con i partecipanti al banchetto.
description.spanish: Has cotilleado con varios asistentes al banquete.
description.schinese: 已与若干名宴会宾客聊八卦。
description.russian: Вы посплетничали с несколькими гостями на банкете.
description.danish: Udvekslede sladder med mange af bankettens gæster.

description.english: Gained audience with Algot Vestergaard
description.german: Eine Audienz bei Algot Vestergaard erhalten.
description.french: Audience obtenue auprès d'Algot Vestergaard.
description.italian: Sei stata ricevuta da Algot Vestergaard.
description.spanish: Has conseguido una audiencia con Algot Vestergaard.
description.schinese: 已与阿尔戈特·韦斯特加德见面。
description.danish: Fik audiens hos Algot Vestergaard.

description.english: Broke into the factory
description.german: In die Fabrik eingebrochen.
description.french: Entrée par effraction dans l'usine effectuée.
description.italian: Hai fatto irruzione nella fabbrica.
description.spanish: Te has colado en la fábrica.
description.schinese: 已闯入诊所。
description.danish: Brød ind på fabrikken.

description.english: Discovered the train schedule
description.german: Den Zugfahrplan entdeckt.
description.french: Horaires de train découverts.
description.italian: Hai scoperto l'orario ferroviario.
description.spanish: Has descubierto los horarios del tren.
description.schinese: 已发现列车时刻表。
description.danish: Fik fat i køreplanen.

description.english: Caused a distraction at the station
description.german: Am Bahnhof für eine Ablenkung gesorgt.
description.french: Diversion créée à la gare.
description.italian: Hai creato un diversivo alla stazione.
description.spanish: Has provocado una distracción en la estación.
description.schinese: 已在车站制造骚乱。
description.danish: Udførte en afledningsmanøvre på stationen.

displayName.english: By the Skin of Her Teeth

description.english: Escaped the train station attack
description.german: Dem Angriff auf den Bahnhof entkommen.
description.french: A pu échapper à l'attaque de la gare.
description.italian: Sei scampata all'attacco alla stazione ferroviaria.
description.spanish: Has escapado del ataque a la estación de tren.
description.schinese: 已从火车站袭击中逃脱。
description.russian: Вы сбежали во время нападения на станцию.
description.danish: Slap væk efter angrebet på stationen.

description.english: Lived to tell the tale
description.german: Überlebt, um die Geschichte zu erzählen.
description.french: A survécu pour raconter toute l'histoire.
description.italian: Sei sopravvissuta per raccontare la tua storia.
description.spanish: Has vivido para contarlo.
description.schinese: 已活下来讲述这个故事。
description.danish: Overlevede til at fortælle sin historie.

description.english: Got drunk at the banquet
description.german: Beim Bankett betrunken.
description.french: S'est enivrée au banquet.
description.italian: Ti sei ubriacata al banchetto.
description.spanish: Te has emborrachado en el banquete.
description.schinese: 已在宴会上喝醉。
description.danish: Drak sig fuld til banketten.

description.english: Scratched the Gestapo car
description.german: Den Lack des Gestapo-Autos zerkratzt.
description.french: Voiture de la Gestapo rayée.
description.italian: Hai rigato l'automobile della Gestapo.
description.spanish: Has rayado el coche de la Gestapo.
description.schinese: 已刮花盖世太保的汽车。
description.danish: Ridsede Gestapo bilen.

description.english: Dug through the trash
description.german: Im Müll gewühlt.
description.french: A fouillé les ordures.
description.italian: Hai frugato nella spazzatura.
description.spanish: Has rebuscado entre la basura.
description.schinese: 已在垃圾中翻找。
description.danish: Rodede i skraldespanden.

description.english: Tried to pick up the knife
description.german: Versucht, das Messer aufzuheben.
description.french: A tenté de ramasser le couteau.
description.italian: Hai provato a prendere il coltello.
description.spanish: Has intentado agarrar el cuchillo.
description.schinese: 已试图捡起刀。
description.danish: Forsøgte at samle kniven op.

description.english: Supported Esther in fixing the radio
description.german: Esther bei der Reparatur des Funkgeräts geholfen.
description.french: Soutien apporté à Esther pour réparer la radio.
description.italian: Hai aiutato Esther a riparare la radio.
description.spanish: Has apoyado a Esther en la reparación de la radio.
description.schinese: 已帮助埃丝特修理收音机。
description.russian: Вы поддержали предложение Эстер починить радио.
description.danish: Hjalp Esther med at reparere radioen.

displayName.english: You Gotta Let Them Come To You
displayName.german: Man muss sie zu sich kommen lassen
displayName.french: Il faut les laisser venir à soi
displayName.italian: Lascia che i gatti vengano a te
displayName.spanish: Tienes que dejar que se acerquen ellos
displayName.danish: Lad de små komme til dig

description.english: Tried to pet the cat
description.german: Versucht, die Katze zu streicheln.
description.french: A essayé de caresser le chat.
description.italian: Hai provato ad accarezzare il gatto.
description.spanish: Has intentado acariciar al gato.
description.schinese: 已试图安抚猫咪。
description.danish: Prøvede at kæle med katten.

description.english: Didn't wake Harald in the clinic
description.german: Harald in der Praxis nicht aufgeweckt.
description.french: A réussi à ne pas réveiller Harald à la clinique.
description.italian: Non hai svegliato Harald alla clinica.
description.spanish: No has despertado a Harald en la clínica.
description.schinese: 未在诊所吵醒哈罗德。
description.russian: Вы не разбудили Харальда в больнице.
description.danish: Undlod at vække Harald i Klinikken.

description.english: Found the note about beans
description.german: Die Nachricht über Bohnen gefunden.
description.french: Message relatif aux haricots trouvé.
description.italian: Hai trovato il biglietto che parla dei fagioli.
description.spanish: Has encontrado la nota sobre las judías.
description.schinese: 找到有关豆子的纸条。
description.danish: Fandt huskesedlen om bønner.

description.english: Used Gerda's nursing skills to treat 5 people or more
description.german: Mit Gerdas Fachkenntnissen mindestens 5 Menschen behandelt.
description.french: Compétences d'infirmière de Gerda utilisées pour soigner au moins 5 personnes.
description.italian: Hai usato le tue nozioni infermieristiche per curare almeno 5 persone.
description.spanish: Has usado los conocimientos de enfermería Gerda para tratar a cinco o más personas.
description.schinese: 已使用格尔达的护理技能治疗至少5人。
description.russian: Вы использовали свои познания медицины, чтобы помочь пятерым людям или больше.
description.danish: Brugte Gerdas sygeplejer evner til at hjælpe flere end fire personer.

description.english: 2 or less Relation with all factions
description.german: Beziehungspunktzahl von 2 oder weniger für alle Fraktionen erreicht.
description.french: Score relationnel inférieur ou égal à 2 avec toutes les factions.
description.italian: Hai totalizzato un punteggio massimo di 2 nelle relazioni con tutte le fazioni.
description.spanish: Has alcanzado una puntuación de 2 o menos en tus relaciones con todas las facciones.
description.schinese: 与所有派系的关系得分不超过2分
description.russian: Ваш уровень отношений со всеми фракциями составляет 2 или меньше.
description.danish: Under tre i relationscore med alle fraktioner.

description.english: 5 or more Relation with all factions
description.german: Beziehungspunktzahl von 5 oder weniger für alle Fraktionen erreicht.
description.french: Score relationnel inférieur ou égal à 5 avec toutes les factions.
description.italian: Hai totalizzato un punteggio massimo di 5 nelle relazioni con tutte le fazioni.
description.spanish: Has alcanzado una puntuación de 5 o menos en tus relaciones con todas las facciones.
description.schinese: 与所有派系的关系得分不超过5分
description.russian: Ваш уровень отношений со всеми фракциями составляет 5 или меньше.
description.danish: Over fire i relationscore med alle fraktioner.

description.english: 7 or more (out of 10) main characters died
description.german: 7 oder mehr Charaktere sind gestorben (von 10).
description.french: Au moins 7 personnages principaux (sur 10) sont morts.
description.italian: Almeno 7 personaggi principali su 10 sono morti.
description.spanish: 7 o más de los 10 personajes principales han muerto.
description.schinese: 至少7名（总共10名）主要角色已死亡。
description.danish: Mere end seks af de centrale karakterer døde.

description.english: 2 or less (out of 10) main characters died
description.german: 2 oder weniger Charaktere sind gestorben (von 10).
description.french: Au maximum 2 personnages principaux (sur 10) sont morts.
description.italian: Al massimo 2 personaggi principali su 10 sono morti.
description.spanish: 2 o menos de los 10 personajes principales han muerto.
description.schinese: 最多2名（总共10名）主要角色已死亡。
description.danish: Mindre end tre af de centrale karakterer døde.

description.english: Achieved 7 or more in Relations with all factions
description.german: Beziehungspunktzahl von 7 oder mehr für alle Fraktionen erreicht.
description.french: Score relationnel supérieur ou égal à 7 avec toutes les factions.
description.italian: Hai totalizzato un punteggio minimo di 7 nelle relazioni con tutte le fazioni.
description.spanish: Has alcanzado una puntuación de 7 o más en tus relaciones con todas las facciones.
description.schinese: 已达成与所有派系的关系得分不低于7分。
description.russian: Вы довели уровень отношений cо всеми фракциями до 7 или больше.
description.danish: Over seks i relationscore med alle fraktioner.

description.english: Used up all your matches
description.german: Alle Streichhölzer verbraucht.
description.french: Toutes vos allumettes ont été utilisées.
description.italian: Hai usato tutti i tuoi fiammiferi.
description.spanish: Has usado todas tus cerillas.
description.schinese: 已用完所有的火柴。
description.danish: Brugte alle tændstikkerne.

description.english: Won the card game
description.german: Das Kartenspiel gewonnen.
description.french: Partie de cartes gagnée.
description.italian: Hai vinto a carte.
description.spanish: Has ganado la partida de cartas.
description.schinese: 已成为牌桌上的赢家。
description.danish: Vandt kortspillet.

description.english: Took every opportunity to spend time with Margit
description.german: Jede Gelegenheit genutzt, um Zeit mit Margit zu verbringen.
description.french: A saisi toutes les occasions de passer du temps avec Margit.
description.italian: Hai sfruttato ogni occasione per trascorrere del tempo con Margit.
description.spanish: Has aprovechado todas las oportunidades de pasar tiempo con Margit.
description.schinese: 已抓住一切机会花时间与玛吉特在一起。
description.russian: Вы проводили время с Маргит при каждой возможности.
description.danish: Brugte enhver chance for at være sammen med Margit.

description.english: Took every opportunity to spend time with the Resistance
description.german: Jede Gelegenheit genutzt, um Zeit mit dem Widerstand zu verbringen.
description.french: A saisi toutes les occasions de passer du temps avec la Résistance.
description.italian: Hai sfruttato ogni occasione per trascorrere del tempo con la Resistenza.
description.spanish: Has aprovechado todas las oportunidades de pasar tiempo con la Resistencia.
description.schinese: 已抓住一切机会花时间和抵抗军在一起。
description.russian: Вы проводили время с Сопротивлением при каждой возможности.
description.danish: Brugte enhver chance for at være sammen med modstandsgruppen.

description.english: Took every opportunity to spend time with Reinhardt
description.german: Jede Gelegenheit genutzt, um Zeit mit Reinhardt zu verbringen.
description.french: A saisi toutes les occasions de passer du temps avec Reinhardt.
description.italian: Hai sfruttato ogni occasione per trascorrere del tempo con Reinhardt.
description.spanish: Has aprovechado todas las oportunidades de pasar tiempo con Reinhardt.
description.schinese: 已抓住一切机会花时间与莱因哈特在一起。
description.russian: Вы проводили время с Райнхардтом при каждой возможности.
description.danish: Brugte enhver chance for at være sammen med Reinhardt.

description.english: Took every opportunity to spend time with Esther and Sophia
description.german: Jede Gelegenheit genutzt, um Zeit mit Esther und Sophia zu verbringen.
description.french: A saisi toutes les occasions de passer du temps avec Esther et Sophia.
description.italian: Hai sfruttato ogni occasione per trascorrere del tempo con Esther e Sophia.
description.spanish: Has aprovechado todas las oportunidades de pasar tiempo con Esther y Sophia.
description.schinese: 已抓住一切机会花时间与埃丝特和索菲亚在一起。
description.russian: Вы проводили время с Эстер и Софией при каждой возможности.
description.danish: Brugte enhver chance for at være sammen med Esther and Sophia.

description.english: Unlocked all character secrets
description.german: Alle Charaktergeheimnisse offenlegen.
description.french: Secrets de tous les personnages débloqués.
description.italian: Hai scoperto tutti i segreti dei personaggi.
description.spanish: Has desbloqueado todos los secretos de los personajes.
description.schinese: 已解锁所有角色秘密。
description.danish: Låste op for alle karakterers hemmeligheder.

description.english: Unlocked all historical facts
description.german: Alle historischen Fakten offengelegt.
description.french: Tous faits historiques débloqués.
description.italian: Hai sbloccato tutti i fatti storici.
description.spanish: Has desbloqueado todos los hechos históricos.
description.schinese: 已解锁所有史实。
description.danish: Låste op for alle historiske facts.

description.english: Completed the tutorial in Liva's story.
description.german: Das Tutorial in Livas Geschichte abgeschlossen.
description.french: Vous avez terminé le tutoriel dans l'histoire de Liva.
description.italian: Hai completato il tutorial della storia di Liva.
description.spanish: Has completado el tutorial de la historia de Liva.
description.schinese: 已完成丽娃剧情的教程。
description.danish: Gennemførte vejledningen i Livas historie.

displayName.danish: Vi er vist ikke i København længere

description.english: Formed a new resistance group at the inn.
description.german: Eine neue Widerstandsgruppe im Gasthaus gegründet.
description.french: Vous avez formé un nouveau groupe de résistants à l'auberge.
description.italian: Hai formato una nuova cellula della Resistenza alla locanda.
description.spanish: Has formado un nuevo grupo de la Resistencia en la posada.
description.schinese: 在旅馆成立一支新抵抗军。
description.russian: Создана новая группа Сопротивления в трактире.
description.danish: Dannede en ny modstandsgruppe på kroen.

description.english: Completed a mission with your new group in Liva's story.
description.german: Eine Mission mit der neuen Gruppe in Livas Geschichte abgeschlossen.
description.french: Vous avez terminé une mission avec votre nouveau groupe dans l'histoire de Liva.
description.italian: Hai completato una missione con il nuovo gruppo nella storia di Liva.
description.spanish: Has completado una misión con tu nuevo grupo en la historia de Liva.
description.schinese: 用你的新队伍在丽娃剧情中完成一个任务。
description.russian: Выполнено задание с новой группой в истории Ливы.
description.danish: Gennemførte en mission med din nye gruppe i Livas historie.

description.english: Gave the best gift to the team member who trusted you the least.
description.german: Das beste Geschenk dem Teammitglied gegeben, das dir am wenigsten vertraut hat.
description.french: Vous avez donné le meilleur cadeau au membre de l'équipe qui vous faisait le moins confiance.
description.italian: Hai dato il regalo più bello al membro del gruppo che confidava meno in te.
description.spanish: Le has dado el mejor regalo al miembro del equipo que menos confiaba en ti.
description.schinese: 把最好的礼物送给队伍中最不信任你的队员。
description.russian: Подарили лучший подарок члену команды, который доверял вам меньше всего.
description.danish: Gav den bedste gave til det gruppemedlem, som havde mindst tillid til dig.

description.english: Escaped the ambush in Liva's story.
description.german: Dem Hinterhalt in Livas Geschichte entkommen.
description.french: Vous avez échappé à l'embuscade dans l'histoire de Liva.
description.italian: Hai evitato l'agguato nella storia di Liva.
description.spanish: Has escapado de la emboscada en la historia de Liva.
description.schinese: 在丽娃剧情中逃过埋伏。
description.russian: Ускользнули от засады в истории Ливы.
description.danish: Undslap bagholdsangrebet i Livas historie.

displayName.danish: Frøken Spurv, om jeg må be'

description.english: Chose to be very particular about your alias three times in a single playthrough.
description.german: In einem Spieldurchgang dreimal sehr viel Wert auf deinen Namen gelegt.
description.french: Vous avez choisi d'insister sur votre pseudonyme trois fois au cours d'une même partie.
description.italian: Hai dimostrato tre volte in una sola partita di badare molto al tuo nome di battaglia.
description.spanish: Has elegido ponerte puntillosa sobre tu apodo tres veces en una misma partida.
description.schinese: 单次通关中三次使用特定化名。
description.russian: Потребовали правильно вас называть три раза за одно прохождение.
description.danish: Valgte at være meget nøjeregnende med dit dæknavn tre gange i en enkelt gennemspilning.

description.english: Completed a high-stakes mission in Liva's story.
description.german: Eine riskante Mission in Livas Geschichte abgeschlossen.
description.french: Vous avez terminé une mission aux enjeux importants dans l'histoire de Liva.
description.italian: Hai completato una missione ad alto rischio nella storia di Liva.
description.spanish: Has completado una misión de alto riesgo en la historia de Liva.
description.schinese: 在丽娃剧情中完成一个高风险任务。
description.russian: Выполнено опасное задание в истории Ливы.
description.danish: Gennemførte en højrisikabel mission i Livas historie.

description.english: Kicked the snitch onto the train tracks, causing his untimely demise.
description.german: Den Spitzel auf das Gleis geschubst und sein frühzeitiges Ableben verursacht.
description.french: Vous avez poussé le mouchard sur les rails, causant son décès prématuré.
description.italian: Hai spinto la talpa sui binari con un calcio, causandone la morte.
description.spanish: Has empujado al soplón a las vías el tren, provocando su muerte.
description.schinese: 将内鬼踢倒在铁轨上，让火车带他见阎王。
description.russian: Толкнули стукача под поезд, навстречу неминуемой смерти.
description.danish: Sparkede stikkeren ud på togskinnerne og var skyld i hans alt for tidlige død.

displayName.french: Rencontre à la boîte aux lettres

description.english: Listened in on Gerda's conversation at the mailbox.
description.german: Gerdas Gespräch beim Briefkasten belauscht.
description.french: Vous avez écouté la conversation de Gerda à la boîte aux lettres.
description.italian: Hai ascoltato la conversazione di Gerda alla cassetta delle lettere.
description.spanish: Has escuchado la conversación de Gerda junto al buzón.
description.schinese: 偷听格尔达在邮箱旁的对话。
description.russian: Подслушали разговор Герды у почтового ящика.
description.danish: Smuglyttede til Gerdas samtale ved postkassen.

description.english: Got Peter to open up to you four times.
description.german: Peter viermal dazu gebracht, sich dir zu öffnen.
description.french: Peter s'est ouvert à vous quatre fois.
description.italian: Hai incoraggiato Peter a confidarsi quattro volte con te.
description.spanish: Has hecho que Peter se abriese cuatro veces.
description.schinese: 让彼得对你敞开心扉4次。
description.danish: Fik Peter til at åbne sig for dig fire gange.

description.english: Got Anders to open up to you four times.
description.german: Anders viermal dazu gebracht, sich dir zu öffnen.
description.french: Anders s'est ouvert à vous quatre fois.
description.italian: Hai incoraggiato Anders a confidarsi quattro volte con te.
description.spanish: Has hecho que Anders se abriese cuatro veces.
description.schinese: 让安德斯对你敞开心扉4次。
description.danish: Fik Anders til at åbne sig for dig fire gange.

description.english: Got Bente to open up to you four times.
description.german: Bente viermal dazu gebracht, sich dir zu öffnen.
description.french: Bente s'est ouverte à vous quatre fois.
description.italian: Hai incoraggiato Bente a confidarsi quattro volte con te.
description.spanish: Has hecho que Bente se abriese cuatro veces.
description.schinese: 让本特对你敞开心扉4次。
description.danish: Fik Bente til at åbne sig for dig fire gange.

description.english: Got Kesse to open up to you four times.
description.german: Kesse viermal dazu gebracht, sich dir zu öffnen.
description.french: Kesse s'est ouvert à vous quatre fois.
description.italian: Hai incoraggiato Kesse a confidarsi quattro volte con te.
description.spanish: Has hecho que Kesse se abriese cuatro veces.
description.schinese: 让凯斯对你敞开心扉4次。
description.danish: Fik Kesse til at åbne sig for dig fire gange.

description.english: Got all team members to open up to you four times.
description.german: Alle Teammitglieder viermal dazu gebracht, sich dir zu öffnen.
description.french: Tous les membres de l'équipe se sont ouverts à vous quatre fois.
description.italian: Hai incoraggiato tutti i membri del gruppo a confidarsi quattro volte con te.
description.spanish: Has hecho que todos los miembros del equipo se abriesen cuatro veces.
description.schinese: 让所有队员对你敞开心扉4次。
description.russian: Все члены команды открылись вам четыре раза.
description.danish: Fik alle gruppemedlemmer til at åbne sig for dig fire gange.

displayName.german: Wie man in den Wald ruft …

description.english: Got your revenge on Toft.
description.german: Du hast dich an Toft gerächt.
description.french: Vous avez pu vous venger de Toft.
description.italian: Hai avuto la tua vendetta su Toft.
description.spanish: Te has vengado de Toft.
description.schinese: 向托夫特复仇。
description.danish: Du fik hævn over Toft.

description.english: Eliminated Eriksen.
description.german: Eriksen wurde eliminiert.
description.french: Vous avez éliminé Eriksen.
description.italian: Hai eliminato Eriksen.
description.spanish: Has eliminado a Eriksen.
description.schinese: 除掉埃里克森。
description.danish: Eliminerede Eriksen.

description.english: Completed the final mission in Liva's story.
description.german: Die letzte Mission in Livas Geschichte abgeschlossen.
description.french: Vous avez terminé la dernière mission dans l'histoire de Liva.
description.italian: Hai completato l'ultima missione della storia di Liva.
description.spanish: Has completado la misión final de la historia de Liva.
description.schinese: 完成丽娃剧情的最终任务。
description.russian: Выполнено последнее задание в истории Ливы.
description.danish: Gennemførte den sidste mission i Livas historie.

description.english: Led your team with a strong sense of duty.
description.german: Das Team mit starkem Pflichtgefühl angeführt.
description.french: Vous avez mené votre équipe avec un fort sens du devoir.
description.italian: Hai guidato il gruppo con un forte senso del dovere.
description.spanish: Has liderado a tu equipo con un fuerte sentido del deber.
description.schinese: 以高度的责任感领导你的队伍。
description.russian: Руководили своей командой, полагаясь на сильное чувство долга.
description.danish: Ledte gruppen med en stærk pligtfølelse.

description.english: Led your team with a fire and brimstone approach.
description.german: Das Team mit Wut im Bauch angeführt.
description.french: Vous avez mené votre équipe en laissant la rage vous guider.
description.italian: Hai guidato il gruppo senza moderare la tua ira.
description.spanish: Has liderado a tu equipo con un enfoque de no dejar títere con cabeza.
description.schinese: 以火爆的脾气领导你的队伍。
description.russian: Руководили своей командой, руководствуясь принципом «огнем и мечом».
description.danish: Ledte gruppen med bål og brand.

description.english: Led your team with a caring attitude.
description.german: Das Team mit einer fürsorglichen Einstellung angeführt.
description.french: Vous avez mené votre équipe avec une attitude attentionnée.
description.italian: Hai guidato il gruppo dimostrandoti attenta ai compagni.
description.spanish: Has liderado a tu equipo con una actitud protectora.
description.schinese: 以关怀备至的态度领导你的队伍。
description.danish: Ledte gruppen med omsorg.

description.english: Unlocked all historical facts in Liva's story.
description.german: Alle historischen Fakten in Livas Geschichte freigeschaltet.
description.french: Vous avez débloqué tous les faits historiques dans l'histoire de Liva.
description.italian: Hai sbloccato tutti i fatti storici nella storia di Liva.
description.spanish: Has desbloqueado todos los hechos históricos en la historia de Liva.
description.schinese: 在丽娃剧情中解锁全部历史资料。
description.russian: Открыты все исторические факты в истории Ливы.
description.danish: Låste op for alle historiske fakta i Livas historie.

description.english: Got every possible character killed in a single playthrough.
description.german: In einem Spieldurchgang alle möglichen Charaktere ums Leben kommen lassen.
description.french: Vous avez entraîné la mort de tous les personnages possibles au cours d'une même partie.
description.italian: Hai causato la morte di tutti i personaggi possibili in una sola partita.
description.spanish: Has hecho que todos los personajes posibles muriesen en una misma partida.
description.schinese: 单次通关中使所有可死亡角色殒命。
description.russian: Все возможные персонажи погибли в одном прохождении.
description.danish: Fik dræbt alle de figurer, det var muligt, i løbet af en enkelt gennemspilning.

displayName.french: Nous n'avons pas mis le feu

description.english: Interrupted the Schalburg party with a fiery distraction.
description.german: Die Schalburg-Feier mit einer feurigen Überraschung gestört.
description.french: Vous avez interrompu la fête de Schalburg avec une diversion enflammée.
description.italian: Hai interrotto la festa dello Schalburgkorps in modo irruento.
description.spanish: Has interrumpido la fiesta del grupo Schalburg con una distracción ardiente.
description.schinese: 放一把火来打断沙尔堡的聚会。
description.danish: Afbrød Schalburg-festen med en flammende afledning

description.english: Finished the snowman.
description.german: Den Schneemann fertiggestellt.
description.french: Vous avez fini le bonhomme de neige.
description.italian: Hai completato il pupazzo di neve.
description.spanish: Has terminado el muñeco de nieve.
description.schinese: 完成雪人。
description.danish: Byggede snemanden færdig.
